description: ExportedServicesSpec defines the desired state of ExportedServices.

services.description: Services is a list of services to be exported and the list of partitions to expose them to.

items.description: ExportedService manages the exporting of a service in the local partition to other partitions.

consumers.description: Consumers is a list of downstream consumers of the service to be exported.

items.description: ServiceConsumer represents a downstream consumer of the service to be exported.

partition.description: Partition is the admin partition to export the service to.

name.description: Name is the name of the service to be exported.

namespace.description: Namespace is the namespace to export the service from.

title: Exported Services
